full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement - Radio Frequency (RF) Shielded Blankets

## Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking bidders for the procurement of Radio Frequency (RF) Shielded Blankets.

## Description
RF Shielded Blankets are designed to prevent RF energy from reaching areas protected by the blankets. The selected supplier will be required to deliver the following goods:

* 10ft x 10ft RF Shielded Blankets ( quantity: 6 pieces)
* 4ft x 4ft RF Shielded Blankets (quantity: 6 pieces)

## Tender Notice Details
* **Tender Reference:** W8474-248463
* **Invitation Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Publication Date:** January 16, 2024
* **Closing Date:** February 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Contract Start Date:** February 8, 2024
* **Contract End Date:** April 15, 2024

## Contact Information
For inquiries or to submit a bid, please contact the following person:
* Name: Brooke Monette
* Email: [brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca](mailto:brooke.monette@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 573-7369

## About this Tender
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The contractor is responsible for ensuring compliance with this agreement. Suppliers interested in bidding must provide their services and goods from Canada.

## Exclusion Rules
* Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement: This procurement is not subject to a Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement.
* Security Requirements: This contract does not include security requirements.

## File Attachments
For easier reference, the tender notice and its amendments may be downloaded from the following links:

* English RFP: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29610/rfp_w8474-248463_eng.pdf
* English Amendment 01: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29610/rfp_w8474-248463_amd01_eng_.pdf
* English Amendment 02: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29610/rfp_w8474-248463_amd02_eng_1.pdf

* French RFP: https://canad
